titles: The Parliaments directions to the Protestants in Ireland. Concerning the taking of the Oath of Allegeance, in confirmation, and tryall of their loyaltie towards the King, and Kingdomes.
notes: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
